title: World of the Psychic with Dr. Peter Venkman
description: Ghostbuster Dr. Peter Venkman’s brief paranormal talk show interviewing psychics and clairvoyants.
quote: And that is the whole problem with aliens… you just can’t trust them.
altHero: Peter Venkman with his finger against his temple pretending to send a psychic message
alt1: Peter sits on a talk show set with two guests
alt2: Peter looks at the camera while talking to guest Milton Angland
